about.title: About <1>Gerald</1><3>.Dev</3>
about.p1: At Gerald.Dev, we love turning ideas into digital solutions that truly work. We create custom web and mobile apps, designed to boost your business—without you having to deal with technical headaches.
about.p2: We work closely with entrepreneurs and small businesses because we understand what you need and know how to take it to the next level: products that work, grow, and deliver results.
about.p3: We keep you in the loop with clear, friendly communication—no nonsense. Here, you’re not just a number: your project matters to us and we’ll be there to support you at every step.
about.p4: Because if you succeed, so do we.

testimonial.title: Testimonials
testimonial.subtitle: What they say about us
testimonial.text: Working with Lorenzo Muñoz has been an exceptional experience. Creating an app made my personalized training system much easier, and now everything works organically without the stress of scheduling every class for my clients. With the app, we made the gym more organized, and everyone loves the new system. We’re already planning to move to a native app because the web version was so successful that it’s pushing us to the next level—and of course, we’ll do it to keep improving quality and personalization.
